meanings.meaning: 1. space (between); gap; interval; distance; stretch 彼はメアリーとトムの間に座った。He was sitting between Mary and Tom.
2. period of time (during, while); duration; interval 彼は病気の間すごい勇気を示した。He showed great courage during his illness.
3. between (two parties or things) 彼は両当事者の間を調停した。He mediated between the two parties.
4. among (a group) テニスは学生の間で大変人気がある。Tennis is very popular among students.
5. relations (between); relationship 二人の間がしっくり行かない。They don't get along together.
6. midpoint; average; halfway; middle ground
7. due to; because of Archaic, Only applies to あいだ
8. Ma (negative space) Ma is a Japanese word which can be roughly translated as ... Read more
間 【あわい】
あわい: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage.
1. time; pause 鬼の居ぬ間に洗濯。When the cat is away, the mice will play.
2. space
3. room
1. interval; period of time その芝居は６ヶ月間上演された。The play ran for six months.
2. among; between; inter- 男女間に不均等が存在することは許されるべきではない。No inequality should be allowed to exist between men and women.
3. good opportunity; chance
4. estrangement; discord; alienation
5. spy; secret agent See also 間諜
1. ken (6 shaku, approx. 1.818 m)
2. counter used to number the gaps between pillars

sentences.translation: He was sitting between Mary and Tom.
He showed great courage during his illness.
He mediated between the two parties.
Tennis is very popular among students.
They don't get along together.

meanings.meaning: 1. interval; space; interstice; threshold
2. valley; gorge; ravine also 硲
3. loophole (in a wall); crenel; eyelet

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to be in time (for) 汽車に間に合うように急げ。Hurry up in order to catch the train.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to serve (suit, meet) the purpose; to be good enough; to be enough; to manage; to make do これで当分は間に合うでしょう。This will do for the time being.
間にあう 【まにあう】

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb

meanings.meaning: 1. to make a mistake (in); to commit an error (e.g. in calculation) あなたがたは間違えることを怖がる必要はありません。You needn't be afraid of making mistakes.
2. to confuse; to mistake something for something else アンタ駅を間違えたようだぜ。You've got the wrong station.
1. to make a mistake (in); to commit an error (e.g. in calculation) あなたがたは間違えることを怖がる必要はありません。You needn't be afraid of making mistakes.
2. to confuse; to mistake something for something else アンタ駅を間違えたようだぜ。You've got the wrong station.

You've got the wrong station.

1. soon; shortly; before long; in a short time; in a little while Usually written using kana aloneまもなくお会いできることを楽しみにしています。I am looking forward to seeing you soon.
2. having no time to ...; with no time to ... after the dictionary form of a verb私は回復する間もなく別のひどい風邪にかかってしまった。I didn't have time to recover before I came down with another horrible cold.
間も無く 【まもなく】

meanings.meaning: 1. to make do with; to manage with; to make shift この機種は気に入らないが、これで間に合わせなければならない。I don't like this model but I'll have to make do with it.
2. to get (something) done in time; to have ready (by) See also 間に合う締め切りに間に合わせるために、私は夜通し働いた。I worked all night so as to meet the deadline.
間に合せる 【まにあわせる】

sentences.translation: I don't like this model but I'll have to make do with it.
I worked all night so as to meet the deadline.
